name: ecosistema-jaraba-theme
description: SCSS compilation, JS minification, image optimization and Critical CSS generation for Ecosistema Jaraba Theme

scripts.build:routes: sass scss/routes/dashboard.scss css/routes/dashboard.css --style=compressed && sass scss/routes/content-hub.scss css/routes/content-hub.css --style=compressed && sass scss/routes/page-builder.scss css/routes/page-builder.css --style=compressed && sass scss/routes/auth.scss css/routes/auth.css --style=compressed && sass scss/routes/landing.scss css/routes/landing.css --style=compressed && sass scss/routes/empleabilidad.scss css/routes/empleabilidad.css --style=compressed && sass scss/routes/ai-features.scss css/routes/ai-features.css --style=compressed
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:admin && npm run build:routes && npm run build:js
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:images && npm run build:critical
